name: Kiki&Bouba
description:
This is our first game ever made, it's not finished yet. Many features have to be added (it will be done pretty soon), for now let's say it is just a prototype.

In main menu just the "play" button works so controls are here below:

cursors - move left/right/up (and down the ladder in case of Bouba)

a - switch character

Esc - back to main menu 

We are aware that currently there is not much cooperation involved. It will be different in a few days
